pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.11: _Mānattaṃ deti_.For the meaning of _mānatta_ see TAP 123.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.13: The point here, which can only be understood from the Pali, is that the word _saṅghādisesa_ (_saṅgha_ + _ādisesa_) is derived from the fact that only the _sangha_ can do the procedures required when a monastic commits this offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:4.27: _Usseko_, which I take to be related to _seka_, perhaps via the prefix _ud_.
